author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

Last Week Affinity stopped selling their software or offering trial downloads. All this in anticipation of a big announcement at the end of this month. But the lack of communication has frustrated a lot of users who are worried about the future of the software.

title: Affinity Stops Selling Their Software - Store is Closed
